comments:
Something is seriously wrong with the standby part support - it seems like it 
is not disposed when the intro is closed.

Scenario:

1) Start runtime workbench with the latest code in the workspace
2) Open Intro
3) Close it using 'Go to workbench' link
4) Open it again from the Help menu
5) Switch to 'Tutorials' and click on a cheat sheet link

Got the following exception:

org.eclipse.swt.SWTException: Widget is disposed

*** Bug 62486 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***

Fixed in HEAD.
builds > 20040518

Code was not unregistering an adaptor factory that we use to hide the Standby 
Implmenetation from the APIs of Customizable INtro part. 

Platform was returning an old instance of standby part.
